articles.description: Tiger Woods has revealed how Muhammad Ali once punched him in a hotel lobby.
articles.content:

articles.description: Former Adelaide plumber Matt Leo has fulfilled his dream of making it to the NFL with the Philadelphia Eagles taking him as part of the league's international pathway program.

Leo does have an advantage over Mailata, who never played a game of American football before joining the Eagles.
